text: Health maintenance organizations shall comply with the following laws:
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 18-360 deleted "and" from the end of par. (4), substituted ";   and" for a period the end of par. (5), and added par. (6).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-252, see notes following § 31-3402.

For history of Law 18-360, see notes under § 31-2231.11.

Miscellaneous Notes

Application of Law 14-252: Section 3 of D.C. Law 14-252 provides: "This act shall not apply until the Commissioner gives written notice that all necessary rules and administrative procedures are in place to effect the provisions of this act."

DC CODE § 31-3408.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Subchapter I of Chapter 7 of this title;
The Reasonable Health Insurance Ratemaking Reform Act of 2010 [Chapters 30A, 31C, and 33A of this title].
